K10D0199_H0200:468b-1: kvan ji li'u phus zhang sh+yan te'u shis thyan kyin /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-3: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-4: sangs rgyas dang; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0199_H0200:468b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi yul /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-7: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-8: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo'i thun dang po
K10D0199_H0200:468b-12: la sku las 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta
K10D0199_H0200:468b-13: bu byung nas rgyal byed kyi tshal lan bdun bskor
K10D0199_H0200:468b-14: te / khyim bdag su ta shal sogs pa 'od kyis reg par byas nas /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-15: 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bu nam mkha' la
K10D0199_H0200:468b-16: sprin bzhin du khyab par byas nas mnyan du yod
K10D0199_H0200:468b-17: pa'i yul kun tu gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i
K10D0199_H0200:468b-18: me tog char rab tu phab bo //
K10D0199_H0200:468b-19: 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i nang nas sprul
K10D0199_H0200:468b-20: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa brgya
K10D0199_H0200:468b-21: stong snang ba thams cad kyis gsung mthun par bskal
K10D0199_H0200:468b-23: byang chub sems dpa' stong gi dang po log par dad sel sangs rgyas pa nas /
K10D0199_H0200:468b-24: tha mar snang mdzad sangs rgyas pa'i don bka' stsal to //
K10D0199_H0200:468b-25: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-0: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya ting nge @469a *//
K10D0199_H0200:469a-1: 'dzin las langs nas 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-3: tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-4: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-5: ma ha ba sha pa ti la sogs pa dge slong ma stong dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-6: khyim bdag su ta sha la sogs pa dge bsnyen pha sum stong dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-7: byi shva khra 'pho ta la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma nyis stong dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-8: kun tu bzang po la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-9: chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
K10D0199_H0200:469a-10: la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang
K10D0199_H0200:469a-14: lha ma yin la sogs pa 'khor thams cad /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis bskul nas sprin bzhin du 'dus so //
K10D0199_H0200:469a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer stong phyung nas /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-17: 'od zer re re kha dog stong stong /
K10D0199_H0200:469a-18: kha dog re re'i nang nas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa snyeng snang ngo //
K10D0199_H0200:469a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung
K10D0199_H0200:469a-20: mthun par byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad
K10D0199_H0200:469a-21: kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa zab mo'i
K10D0199_H0200:469a-23: aa nan ta mu dra zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-0: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes @469b zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-1: sgrib pa med pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-2: mtshan ma med par rnam par grol ba chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-3: sgra skad gcig gis brgya phrag bye ba'i gzungs kyi sgo bka' stsal to //
K10D0199_H0200:469b-4: gzungs kyi sgo bka' stsal ma thag tu 'khor 'dus
K10D0199_H0200:469b-5: pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes
K10D0199_H0200:469b-6: bya ba / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-7: de ma thag tu bye ba brgya phrag khri'i gzungs kyi sgo thob nas /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-8: stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas thal mo sbyar te /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10D0199_H0200:469b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au p'a li stan las langs te /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0199_H0200:469b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon du'ang mdzod kyi chos thams cad las /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-16: ma pham pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas par gsung na /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-17: ma pham pa so so'i skye bo'i lus dang ma bral /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-19: ma pham pa 'di nyid du rab tu byung yang /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-21: nyon mongs pa ma spangs na /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par sangs rgyas par bka' stsal na /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-23: ma pham pa de tshe'i dus byas nas khams gang du skye ba len par 'gyur /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis au p'a li la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0199_H0200:469b-26: gcig tu gyis la nyon cig /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-1: pa thams cad mkhyen pas 'khor 'di'i nang du /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
K10D0199_H0200:470a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0199_H0200:470a-4: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'gyur
K10D0199_H0200:470a-6: dus 'di nas lo bcu gnyis kyi 'og tu tshe'i dus byas nas /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-7: nges par dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba len
K10D0199_H0200:470a-8: par 'gyur ro; ;de nas dga' ldan gyi gnam gyi
K10D0199_H0200:470a-9: steng na / lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga brgya yod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-10: lha'i bu re res kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyod pas /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-11: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i don du /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-12: lha'i bsod nams kyi mthus gzhal med khang byas te /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-13: rang rang gi lus kyi gos dang /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-15: rin po che'i dbu rgyan phud de /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-16: pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-17: smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo //
K10D0199_H0200:470a-18: bdag gi rin thang med pa'i rin po che dang /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-19: lha'i dbu rgyan gyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po la mchod pa'i don du /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-20: ma pham pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ring po mi thogs par /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-22: bdag cag gi rin po che'i dbu rgyan 'di /
K10D0199_H0200:470a-23: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
K10D0199_H0200:470a-24: pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas su gyur cig ces lha'i bu
K10D0199_H0200:470a-25: thams cad rang rang pus mo btsugs te /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-0: smon lam de @470b skad ces btab pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-1: de nas lha thams cad kyis smon lam btab ma thag tu /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-2: rin po che'i dbu rgyan thams cad bye ba khrag
K10D0199_H0200:470b-3: khrig phrag lnga brgya'i gzhal med khang du gyur te
K10D0199_H0200:470b-4: / rin po che'i gzhal med khang re re la'ang skyed mos tshal bdun bdun /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-5: skyed mos tshal re re 'ang rin po che sna bdun bdun las grub pa /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-6: rin po che re re las kyang bye ba phrag
K10D0199_H0200:470b-7: lnga brgya'i 'od kyi 'od zer re re las bye
K10D0199_H0200:470b-9: pad ma re re las bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i
K10D0199_H0200:470b-10: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi phreng ba
K10D0199_H0200:470b-11: / shing re re'i lo ma las bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-12: rin po che'i kha dog re re las kyang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-13: 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od re re'i nang nas kyang
K10D0199_H0200:470b-14: bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i lha'i bu
K10D0199_H0200:470b-15: mo; lha'i bu mo re re'ang shing gi drung na
K10D0199_H0200:470b-16: 'dug nas / lag na bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che grangs med pa'i do shal thogs /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-17: ngo mtshar che ba'i glu dbyangs snyan pa len /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-18: glu dbyangs snyan pa'i nang nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo spyod /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-19: shing de dag las 'bras bu skyes pa'i kha dog bee d'urya bzhin du 'dug /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-20: kha dog de dag thams cad bee d'urya'i nang du 'dug pa /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-21: 'od zer de dag thams cad g-yas phyogs su 'khor ba /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-22: sgra snyan pa sna tshogs 'byung ba /
K10D0199_H0200:470b-23: sgra thams cad las byams pa chen po dang /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-1: pa; re re'i pho brang mtho khyad ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-2: rngams su dpag tshad bcu bzhi /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-3: klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag lnga brgyas ni pho brang bskor /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-4: klu'i rgyal po re re'ang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i
K10D0199_H0200:471a-5: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi char phab
K10D0199_H0200:471a-6: pas pho brang gi steng brgyan /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-7: rang bzhin rlung byung bas shing de dag bskyod pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-8: shing de las mi rtag pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sgra byung bar gyur to //
K10D0199_H0200:471a-13: de nas pho brang de'i nang na rgyal po chen po le'u du ba ti zhes bya ba /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-14: stan la 'dug pa las langs te /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-15: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag btsal nas /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-16: smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo //
K10D0199_H0200:471a-17: bdag gi bsod nams kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams
K10D0199_H0200:471a-18: pa'i chos kyi pho brang byed pa'i bsod nams dang
K10D0199_H0200:471a-19: ldan na / bdag gi smin mtshams par nas nor
K10D0199_H0200:471a-20: bu rin po che rang byung bar gyur cig ces
K10D0199_H0200:471a-22: de ma thag tu bye ba phrag brgya'i rin po che byung nas /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-23: rin po che bee d'urya la sogs pa'i kha dog thams cad rdzogs par grub pa /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-24: shel gyi kha dog bzhin phyi nang gsal ba /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-25: rin po che de dag nam mkha' stong pa la 'khor zhing /
K10D0199_H0200:471a-26: ngo mtshar che ba'i rin po che'i pho brang rim
K10D0199_H0200:471b-0: pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sprul par gyur @471b to;
K10D0199_H0200:471b-1: ;re re'i lan zhun re re las kyang bye ba
K10D0199_H0200:471b-2: 'bum phrag gi rin po che pad ma 'dis spras
K10D0199_H0200:471b-4: lan zhun gyi bar thams cad na rdzus te skyes pa'i lha'i bu bye ba phrag dgu dang /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-5: lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag lnga brgya la /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-6: lha'i bu re re'i lag nas rin po che sna
K10D0199_H0200:471b-7: bdun bdun las grub pa'i padma dpag tu med pa
K10D0199_H0200:471b-9: padma re re'i steng du 'od bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-10: 'od de dag gi nang na lha'i rol mo'i cha spyad ma dkrol bar sgra rang byung ba /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-11: sgra de dag byung ba dang /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-12: bu mo thams cad langs nas rol mo'i cha spyad
K10D0199_H0200:471b-13: thogs te gar dang; glu dbyangs snyan pa len pa'i
K10D0199_H0200:471b-14: sgra las dge ba bcu dang /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-15: smon lam bzhi la sogs pa'i sgra lha thams cad
K10D0199_H0200:471b-16: kyis thos pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0199_H0200:471b-17: sems bskyed do // de nas skyed mos tshal thams
K10D0199_H0200:471b-18: cad kyi nang na skyed mos tshal kha dog brgyad
K10D0199_H0200:471b-20: rdzing bu re re'i nang na bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che las grub pa /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-21: rdzing bu re re'i nang na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-22: chu de dag kyang gyen du 'bab pa /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-23: sgo bzhi'i phyi rol na rdzus te skyes pa'i padma bzhi /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-24: padma de dag las chu byung ba rin po che'i padma'i kha dog bzhin du 'bab pa /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-25: padma re re'i steng du lha'i bu mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzhi /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-26: lus kyi kha dog ngo mtshar che ba /
K10D0199_H0200:471b-27: byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du brgyan pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-1: lag na rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi snod bye ba phrag lnga brgya sprul /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-2: snod re re'i nang na lha'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin
K10D0199_H0200:472a-3: thams cad kyis gang ba phrag pa g-yon la thogs
K10D0199_H0200:472a-4: pa / do shal dpag tu med pa phrag pa g-yas la thogs pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-5: rol mo'i cha byad dpag tu med pa sprin bzhin du nam mkha' la 'dug pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-7: byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-8: dga' ldan gyi gnam du skyes pa'i lha'i bu gang
K10D0199_H0200:472a-9: la la zhig rang bzhin gyis lha'i bu mo rnams
K10D0199_H0200:472a-11: rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi yod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-13: rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-16: padma re re la'ang rin po che phrag brgya las grub pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-17: rin po che re re la'ang bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od zer /
K10D0199_H0200:472a-18: 'od zer de dag las ngo mtshar che ba sprul
K10D0199_H0200:472a-19: pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog sprul
K10D0199_H0200:472a-20: pas brgyan pa / rin po che'i yol ba bres
K10D0199_H0200:472a-21: pa de'i phyogs na tshangs pa'i rgyal po bye ba
K10D0199_H0200:472a-22: phrag stong gis rang rang gi tshangs pa'i lha'i ngo
K10D0199_H0200:472a-23: mtshar che ba'i dril bu khyer nas yol ba'i steng
K10D0199_H0200:472a-24: pas brgyan pa / du dbyangs pa / tshangs pa'i
K10D0199_H0200:472a-25: rgyal po chung dus kyang rin po che sna tshogs
K10D0199_H0200:472a-26: pa'i dra bas yol ba'i steng du bres pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-0: lha'i bu mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor @472b
K10D0199_H0200:472b-1: gyis rin po che'i me tog padma thams cad khyer
K10D0199_H0200:472b-2: nas khri'i steng du bdal ba /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-3: padma de dag thams cad rin po che'i rang bzhin
K10D0199_H0200:472b-4: gyi bu mo bye ba phrag lnga brgya byung ba
K10D0199_H0200:472b-5: de dag gi lag na rnga yab dkar po thogs
K10D0199_H0200:472b-6: pa / yol ba'i nang na 'dug pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-7: pho brang zur bzhi la rin po che'i ka ba bzhi yod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-8: rin po che'i ka ba re re la'ang brgya phrag stong gi khang pa brtsegs pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-9: bu mo 'di'i nor bu ni bres /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-10: lan kan bar kun tu lha'i bu mo brgya stong yod /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-11: kha dog ngo mtshar che ba dpag tu med pa'i rol mo'i cha spyad lag na thogs pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-12: rol mo'i sgra'i nang nas sdug bsngal ba dang; stong pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sgra 'byung ba /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-16: lha'i pho brang de dag nas rin po che'i kha
K10D0199_H0200:472b-17: dog dpag tu med pa bye ba phrag brgya yod
K10D0199_H0200:472b-18: pa / bu mo re re kun kyang rin po che'i kha dog dang mthun par sprul to //
K10D0199_H0200:472b-19: de nas phyogs bcu'i lha dpag tu med pa thams
K10D0199_H0200:472b-20: cad dga' ldan gyi lha'i pho brang du skye ba
K10D0199_H0200:472b-21: len par smon lam btab bo //
K10D0199_H0200:472b-22: de nas dga' ldan gyi pho brang na rgyal po
K10D0199_H0200:472b-23: chen po lnga po la rgyal po chen po dang
K10D0199_H0200:472b-24: po ni / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
K10D0199_H0200:472b-25: ba lus la rin po che sna bdun gyi char
K10D0199_H0200:472b-26: 'bebs pas pho brang gi nang du 'thor ba /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-27: rin po che'i nor bu re re'ang rol mo'i cha spyad dpag tu med par sprul pa /
K10D0199_H0200:472b-28: nam mkha' la kun tu 'phyang ba /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-0: ma brdungs par sgra snyan pa dpag tu @473a *//
K10D0199_H0200:473a-2: sems can gyi yid rtog pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-3: rgyal po gnyis pa me tog 'thor ba zhes bya
K10D0199_H0200:473a-4: ba lus la me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs
K10D0199_H0200:473a-5: pa / pho brang thams cad khyab par me tog gi gdugs sprul /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-6: gdugs re re'ang brgya phrag stong gi rgyal mtshan dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-9: spos kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba lus kyi ba spu'i
K10D0199_H0200:473a-10: khung bu'i nang nas ngo mtshar che ba'i rgya mtsho'i
K10D0199_H0200:473a-11: 'gram gyi tsandan gyi spos kyi char 'bebs pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-12: spos de dag sprin bzhin du chags pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-13: kha dog brgya phrag gis pho brang lan bdun du bskor ba /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-14: rgyal po chen po bzhi pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-15: dga' ba bde ba zhes bya ba lus la yid
K10D0199_H0200:473a-16: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i char 'bebs pa
K10D0199_H0200:473a-17: / rin po che re re'ang rang bzhin gyis rgyal mtshan dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-18: 'phan gyi steng du 'dug nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-20: dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'chad pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-21: yan lag lnga'i tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-22: dge ba'i chos dpag tu med pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-24: byams pa byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra la 'dzud pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-25: rgyal po chen po lnga pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-26: sgra dbyangs drag po zhes bya ba lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas chu 'bebs pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-27: chu re re'i steng du me tog padma bye ba phrag lnga brgya yod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473a-28: padma re re'i steng du shel gyi bu mo nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-0: @473b shel gyi bu mo re re'i lus thams cad
K10D0199_H0200:473b-1: kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re'i nang nas lha'i
K10D0199_H0200:473b-2: bdud las rgyal ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byung ba sprul
K10D0199_H0200:473b-3: lo // bcom ldan 'das kyis au p'a li la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-4: dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas zhes bya bar dge ba bcu dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-5: rgyal ba la drin bsab pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-6: ngo mtshar che ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams ni ngas
K10D0199_H0200:473b-7: bskal pa chung du gcig gi bar du 'dug nas
K10D0199_H0200:473b-8: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0199_H0200:473b-10: dge ba bcu'i 'bras bu bshad kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med de /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-11: 'dir ngas khyed la sogs pa la mdo tsam zhig bshad cing bstan par bya'o //
K10D0199_H0200:473b-14: 'khor thams cad kyang rung ste gang la la zhig
K10D0199_H0200:473b-15: skye shi la mi skyo bar lha'i gnas su skye
K10D0199_H0200:473b-16: bar 'dod na / bla na med pa'i byang chub
K10D0199_H0200:473b-17: tu sems bskyed pa byams pa'i zhabs 'bring byed 'dod
K10D0199_H0200:473b-19: yan lag lnga'i khrims brgyad rdzogs pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-20: lus sems kyi brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-21: dge ba bcu'i chos la spyod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-22: bde skyid phun sum tshogs par 'dod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:473b-23: sems rtse gcig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye
K10D0199_H0200:473b-24: bar 'dod pa de dag ni yang dag par lta
K10D0199_H0200:473b-26: gzhan du lta ba ni log par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0199_H0200:473b-27: de nas au p'a li stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas gdong dang /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-3: dga' ldan gyi gnam du de lta bu'i bde skyid
K10D0199_H0200:474a-4: phun sum tshogs pa der skyes bu chen po 'di
K10D0199_H0200:474a-5: dus ci tsam du 'dzam bu'i gling nas lha'i gnas
K10D0199_H0200:474a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-8: dus 'di nas lo bcu gnyis lon nas dpyid zla
K10D0199_H0200:474a-9: 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga'i nyi ma la yul bar
K10D0199_H0200:474a-10: ni kra ba li'i grong khyer na bram ze chen
K10D0199_H0200:474a-11: po pa pa li zhes bya ba'i khyim nas skye
K10D0199_H0200:474a-12: ba blangs pa'i sa nas skyil mo krung bcas nas
K10D0199_H0200:474a-13: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du
K10D0199_H0200:474a-14: lus gser gyi kha dog dang /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-15: 'od zer dmar po nyi ma brgya stong bas lhag /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-16: steng gi dga' ldan gyi gnam du lus kyi sku gdung yang /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-18: gser gyi gzugs bzhin du mi g-yo mi 'gul bar
K10D0199_H0200:474a-19: lus kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas
K10D0199_H0200:474a-20: rnam pa thar pa gsum dang /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yi ge gsal bar ston te /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-22: de nas lha mi thams cad rjes su 'brang nas /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-23: rin po che sku gdung gyi mchod rten la mchod nas /
K10D0199_H0200:474a-24: de nas dga' ldan gyi gnam du rin po che
K10D0199_H0200:474a-25: sna bdun gyi pho brang na 'di gzhal med khang
K10D0199_H0200:474a-26: seng ge'i padma'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas
K10D0199_H0200:474a-27: lus 'dzam bu gser gyi kha dog bzhin du rdzus
K10D0199_H0200:474a-28: te skyes nas / sku tshur dpag tshad bcu drug /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-0: dpe byad @474b bzang po brgyad cus rdzogs par brgyan pa /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-2: dbu skra bee d'urya'i kha dog dang 'dra ba /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-3: shi kra bi li kra dang /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-5: gyen shugs kyi rin po che sa lha'i dbu rgyan brgyan pa /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-6: rin po che lha'i dbu brgyan de dag la bye
K10D0199_H0200:474b-7: ba phrag brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog re re'i
K10D0199_H0200:474b-8: nang nas / sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag
K10D0199_H0200:474b-9: tu med pa brgya stong phrag khri'i sprul pa'i byang
K10D0199_H0200:474b-10: chub sems dpa' mang pos zhabs 'bring byas pa /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-11: de nas zhing khams gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad cho 'phrul bco brgyad ston cing /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-12: lha'i dbu rgyan gyi nang na yid la smon pa'i
K10D0199_H0200:474b-13: rjes su mthun par lha'i dbu rgyan gyi nang na
K10D0199_H0200:474b-14: gnas so // byams pa'i smin mtshams nas 'od zer
K10D0199_H0200:474b-15: dkar po byung ste 'od zer de dag las brgyan
K10D0199_H0200:474b-16: phrag gi rin po che'i kha dog dang /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-17: ldan pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-18: mtshan re re'i nang nas bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog dpe byad bzang po /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-19: dpe byad re re la'ang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i mtshan dang /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-20: dpe byad kyi kha dog 'bar ba'i lha'i bu re
K10D0199_H0200:474b-21: re'i 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sprin thams
K10D0199_H0200:474b-22: cad padma las rang rang 'dug nas /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-23: nyin mtshan rtag par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo spyod pa /
K10D0199_H0200:474b-24: bgrod pa gcig cing don grub par byed pa phrag
K10D0199_H0200:474b-25: lnga brgya'i lha'i bu de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i
K10D0199_H0200:474b-26: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0199_H0200:475a-1: dga' ldan gyi gnam du nyin mtshan rtag tu phyir
K10D0199_H0200:475a-2: mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la lha'i
K10D0199_H0200:475a-4: 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshe lo'i grangs bye ba 'bum
K10D0199_H0200:475a-5: phrag lnga bcu rtsa drug lon nas byams pa dga'
K10D0199_H0200:475a-6: ldan gyi gnam nas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye ba
K10D0199_H0200:475a-7: blangs pa'i mdo bshad par 'gyur ro //
K10D0199_H0200:475a-9: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba 'dzam
K10D0199_H0200:475a-10: bu'i gling nas tshe 'phos nas dga' ldan gnam du
K10D0199_H0200:475a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas de'i
K10D0199_H0200:475a-13: 'khor nye gnas las gang la la zhig brtson 'grus
K10D0199_H0200:475a-15: sdom pa ma zhig cing mchod rten la phyag ba dar dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-16: mandal byed pa dang; spos dri zhim pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-17: me tog gi mchod pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-18: rnam par thar pa gsum la spyod cing /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-19: zab cing drang ba'i chos la spyod pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-21: sems rtse gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid la zlos pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-22: mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475a-24: byams pa'i mtshan brjod pa de lta bu la sogs
K10D0199_H0200:475a-25: pa'i mi de dag ni 'di skad cig tsam du
K10D0199_H0200:475a-26: khrims brgyad mnos nas sdig pa thams cad byang bar
K10D0199_H0200:475a-27: byed cing / smon lam btab nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-0: @475b skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brgyang
K10D0199_H0200:475b-1: ba tsam du dga' ldan du skyes nas padma'i steng
K10D0199_H0200:475b-2: du skyil mo krung bcas nas /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-3: brgya phrag stong gi lha'i bus lha'i rol mo byed cing me tog mand'ar ba dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-4: mand'a ra ba chen po 'thor zhing legs so //
K10D0199_H0200:475b-8: khyod ni 'dzam bu'i gling du bsod nams rgya chen
K10D0199_H0200:475b-9: po bsags nas; 'chi 'pho ba'i 'og tu 'di ni
K10D0199_H0200:475b-10: dga' ldan gyi gnas zhes bya ba yin te /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-11: 'dir lha'i rgyal po byams pa zhes bya ba la /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-14: phyag 'tshal na smin mtshams kyi mdzod sku nas 'od zer dkar pos reg par byas nas /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-15: bskal pa dgu bcu'i skye shi las grol zhing sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0199_H0200:475b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan gyis ngo mtshar chos bshad nas /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-17: brtson pa mi 'dor ba phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-18: bla na med pa'i lam yid la sems pa de
K10D0199_H0200:475b-19: lta bu la sogs pa'i sems can sdig pa thams
K10D0199_H0200:475b-20: cad byang zhing chos drug la spyod na the tshom
K10D0199_H0200:475b-21: med par nges par dga' ldan gyi gnam du skyes
K10D0199_H0200:475b-22: nas / 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong /
K10D0199_H0200:475b-23: byams pa'i zhabs 'bring nas 'dzam bu'i gling du dang
K10D0199_H0200:475b-24: por chos thos nas ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 'di
K10D0199_H0200:476a-0: bskal pa skar ma lta bu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'ang @476a *//
K10D0199_H0200:476a-1: zhal mthong nas sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi
K10D0199_H0200:476a-2: drung du byang chub tu lung ston pa thob par
K10D0199_H0200:476a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476a-13: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'khor thams cad
K10D0199_H0200:476a-14: las gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems
K10D0199_H0200:476a-15: dpa' chen po byams pa'i mtshan thos nas dga' ba
K10D0199_H0200:476a-16: dang / gus par phyag 'tshal ba'i mi de dag
K10D0199_H0200:476a-17: tshe'i dus byas nas se gol gtogs pa tsam du
K10D0199_H0200:476a-18: gong ma ci lta ba bzhin du /
K10D0199_H0200:476a-19: byams pa'i mtshan thos nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu mun pa'i khams su mi ltung /
K10D0199_H0200:476a-22: mi dge ba thams cad spyod par mi skye /
K10D0199_H0200:476a-23: skye ba thams cad du drang por lta ba dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476a-25: dkon mchog gsum la mi smod par skye'o //
K10D0199_H0200:476a-28: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig /
K10D0199_H0200:476a-30: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pas byang chub
K10D0199_H0200:476a-31: sems dpa' thugs rje chen po'i mtshan thos pas mtshan
K10D0199_H0200:476a-32: nas brjod cing / yan lag lnga gtugs te /
K10D0199_H0200:476a-33: sems rtse gcig tu bshags na sdig pa thams cad
K10D0199_H0200:476b-0: myur du @476b byang nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi
K10D0199_H0200:476b-1: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje
K10D0199_H0200:476b-2: chen po'i mtshan brjod pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476b-3: sku gzugs bris nas spos dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476b-8: phyag btsal zhing yid la zlos na mi de dag
K10D0199_H0200:476b-9: tshe'i dus byas pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0199_H0200:476b-10: byams pas / mi chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476b-11: lha'i bu thams cad kyis mand'a ra ba'i char phab
K10D0199_H0200:476b-12: nas mi de dag bsdus nas skad cig yud tsam
K10D0199_H0200:476b-14: 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong nas gdong dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476b-15: spyi bos phyag btsal nas de ma thag tu chos thos pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476b-16: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi la mthob pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:476b-17: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang //
K10D0199_H0200:476b-18: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0199_H0200:476b-19: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
K10D0199_H0200:476b-22: khyod rtse gcig tu nyon la yid la gyis shig /
K10D0199_H0200:476b-23: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba la
K10D0199_H0200:476b-24: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad skyabs su 'gro
K10D0199_H0200:476b-25: ba na gang la la zhig skyabs su 'gro ba'i
K10D0199_H0200:476b-26: mi de dag ni bla na med pa'i lam dang;
K10D0199_H0200:476b-27: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'thob nas byang chub
K10D0199_H0200:476b-28: sems dpa' byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0199_H0200:476b-29: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i dus
K10D0199_H0200:477a-1: mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mthong nas lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0199_H0200:477a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'khor bzhi po dang /
K10D0199_H0200:477a-6: gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang la la zhig dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i dus kyi tshe /
K10D0199_H0200:477a-8: dga' ldan yid la byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa blangs nas /
K10D0199_H0200:477a-10: nyi ma bdun gyi bar du /
K10D0199_H0200:477a-11: dge ba bcu yid la byed pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:477a-12: dge ba bcu'i lam la spyod pa'i bsod nams de
K10D0199_H0200:477a-13: dag byams pa'i mdun du bsngo zhing smon lam btab
K10D0199_H0200:477a-14: pa de dag ni lta ba de dag gi lha'i
K10D0199_H0200:477a-17: gang la la zhig skad cig tsam byams pa'i ming nas brjod pa'i mi de dag ni /
K10D0199_H0200:477a-18: bskal pa stong nyis brgya'i skye shi las grol zhing sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0199_H0200:477a-19: byams pa'i mtshan thos pas thal mo sbyar ba'i mi de dag ni /
K10D0199_H0200:477a-20: bskal pa lnga bcu'i skye shi las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0199_H0200:477a-21: gang la la zhig byams pa la gus par phyag
K10D0199_H0200:477a-22: btsal bas bskal pa bye ba brgya'i skye shi las
K10D0199_H0200:477a-23: grol / thar zhing sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0199_H0200:477a-24: lha'i gnas la mi chags shing ma 'ongs pa'i dus
K10D0199_H0200:477a-25: su klu'i sdong po byang chub kyi shing drung du
K10D0199_H0200:477a-26: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems
K10D0199_H0200:477b-1: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:477b-2: 'khor mang po dpag tu med pa stan las langs
K10D0199_H0200:477b-3: te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
K10D0199_H0200:477b-4: btsal nas byams pa'i zhabs la'ang phyag btsal nas bcom
K10D0199_H0200:477b-5: ldan 'das dang / byams pa la la na brgya
K10D0199_H0200:477b-6: stong du bskor nas lam mthob par dag rang rang
K10D0199_H0200:477b-8: bdag cag la sogs pas lha dang /
K10D0199_H0200:477b-10: sde brgyad po 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K10D0199_H0200:477b-11: mos pas smon lam btab pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus
K10D0199_H0200:477b-13: 'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong ba dang /
K10D0199_H0200:477b-14: thams cad dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba thob par gyur cig /
K10D0199_H0200:477b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0199_H0200:477b-16: khyod la sogs pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bsod nams byed pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:477b-18: thams cad byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i drung du
K10D0199_H0200:477b-19: skye ba blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
K10D0199_H0200:477b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis au p'a li la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0199_H0200:477b-23: de lta bur lta ba ni yang dag par lta ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0199_H0200:477b-24: gzhan du lta ba ni log par lta ba zhes
K10D0199_H0200:477b-25: bya'o; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
K10D0199_H0200:477b-26: stan la 'dug pa las langs te pus mo btsugs
K10D0199_H0200:477b-27: nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di
K10D0199_H0200:478a-2: byams pa'i yon tan legs par bshad do //
K10D0199_H0200:478a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe bsod nams byed pa'i
K10D0199_H0200:478a-4: sems can 'bras bu thob pa bdag cag gis thob
K10D0199_H0200:478a-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mtshan ci lags /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-7: bdag cag gis ci ltar gzung bar bgyi /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-9: kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-11: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma brjed
K10D0199_H0200:478a-12: par gzung la ma 'ongs pa'i don du lha'i gnas
K10D0199_H0200:478a-13: su skye pa'i lam 'byed pa dang /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi gcod pas mdo sde'i ming /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-16: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang bya /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-17: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnam
K10D0199_H0200:478a-18: du skye ba blangs nas byang chub kyi snying po
K10D0199_H0200:478a-19: la bskul ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0199_H0200:478a-21: zhing khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0199_H0200:478a-22: 'bum phrag bcu bzhi'i le'u brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin
K10D0199_H0200:478a-24: lha'i bu 'bum phrag brgyad kyis bla na med pa'i
K10D0199_H0200:478a-25: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas thams cad kyis byams
K10D0199_H0200:478a-26: pa'i rjes su 'brang nas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye
K10D0199_H0200:478b-0: bcom ldan @478b 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
